toolsets.name: Next.js Calendar Workspace
toolsets.description: Guidance and reusable commands for the Notion Calendar Next.js 16 project.
guidelines: Use TypeScript with strict typing and avoid any.
Prefer Next.js App Router server components unless client-only APIs are needed.
Use Tailwind CSS utilities plus shadcn/ui primitives from @/components/ui.
Import the cn helper from @/lib/utils for className composition.
Use react-hook-form with zod for forms and date-fns for date math.
Run pnpm lint and pnpm type-check before opening a PR.
Keep components focused and extract shared UI into components/ui.

workflows.name: Add a calendar component
steps: Create or update a component under components/ using strict TypeScript.
Import UI primitives from @/components/ui and reuse cn().
Write tests or stories if applicable and ensure accessibility.
Run pnpm lint and pnpm type-check to validate changes.

workflows.name: Ship a feature
steps: Synchronize with main (git pull --rebase origin main).
Implement the feature with small, focused components.
Update documentation or README if behavior changes.
Run pnpm lint, pnpm type-check, and pnpm build before opening a PR.
